@@ -405,7 +405,6 @@
 		<!--menuref id="Arcade" grayedif="!system.isarcade" /-->
 		<item id="DecorateGames" caption="DECORATIONS" help="Select what kind of information you want to see on the right of your gamelist: regions flags, players or game genre." />
 		<item id="HighlightRegion" caption="HIGHLIGHT GAMES OF REGION..." help="Select a region to filter out games not matching the selected region." />
-		<item id="AliasPreferredRegion" caption="ALIAS PREFERRED REGION" help="Choose you region for display aliases" />
 		<item id="FlattenFolders" caption="FLATTEN FOLDERS" grayedif="system.isalwaysflat" help="Switch between seeing the folders structure and seeing all games in a flatten top level." grayedHelp="This system is either always flattened or cannot be flattened!" />
 		<item id="ShowOnlyFavorites" caption="SHOW ONLY FAVORITES" grayedif="system.isfavorites" help="Switch between seing or not only the favorites games. To add a game in the favorite list, select the game and toggle its state using 'Y'." grayedHelp="You can't hide favorites in the Favorite system!" />
 		<item id="ShowFavoriteFirst" caption="FAVORITES FIRST" grayedif="system.isfavorites or system.isarcade" help="Display favorites at the top of gamelists." grayedHelp="Favorites are always fist in the Favorite system!" />
